titleStmt.title: The masque of augures With the seueral antimasques. Presented on Twelfe night.
titleStmt.author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.

notesStmt.note: The year on title page is given according to Lady Day dating.
One British Library copy has added note at end initialed: B.I.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
